project.title: Library Management System API
project.details: Robust API using Express, TypeScript, and MongoDB with advanced book and borrowing operations, validation, and aggregation.
project.longDetails:
A robust Library Management System built with Express, TypeScript, and MongoDB (via Mongoose). This API provides endpoints to manage books, handle borrowing operations, and generate summaries using MongoDB aggregation pipelines.

  • Book Management: Create, update, delete, and filter books with schema validation and unique ISBN enforcement.
  • Borrow Operations: Borrow books with quantity checks and auto-availability toggle via instance methods.
  • Aggregation Pipeline: Summarize borrowed books with total quantities and titles.
  • Mongoose Enhancements: Includes pre/post-save middleware, instance/static methods, and schema hooks.
  • Error Handling: Centralized middleware with detailed messages and 404 handling.
  • TypeScript Support: Fully typed controllers, models, and interfaces for safer development.
  • Code Quality: ESLint, Prettier, modular architecture, and consistent formatting.

üìÅ Project Structure

src/
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/
  ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ controllers/
  ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ middlewares/
  ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models/
  ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ interfaces/
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ config/
  ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app.ts
  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ server.ts

üõ†Ô∏è Setup

git clone https://github.com/khairul1036/Library-Management-API-Assignment-3.git
cd library-management-api
npm install
touch .env
PORT=3000
DB_USER=yourUsername
DB_PASS=yourPassword
npm run dev

üìö API Endpoints

  • POST /api/books ‚Äì Create new book
  • GET /api/books ‚Äì Retrieve all books
  • GET /api/books/:id ‚Äì Retrieve a book by ID
  • PUT /api/books/:id ‚Äì Update a book
  • DELETE /api/books/:id ‚Äì Delete a book
  • POST /api/borrow ‚Äì Borrow a book
  • GET /api/borrow ‚Äì Get borrow summary via aggregation

Test & Deployment: Use Postman or cURL. MongoDB must be running. Linting and formatting handled via ESLint and Prettier.
project.author: Khairul Islam

project.title: SellSense - AI Powered CRM
project.details: SellSense is a comprehensive CRM platform with AI-powered support, built to manage customers, inventory, orders, suppliers, payments, and sales analytics in a single dashboard.
project.longDetails:
SellSense is a powerful CRM system designed to give administrators complete control over store operations. It integrates AI-powered customer support, analytics dashboards, inventory tracking, and loyalty program management. Key modules include:

  • Dashboard ‚Äì Visual summary of revenue, products, customers, orders, stock, and feedback.
  • Orders ‚Äì Order management with user info, category, price, and location.
  • Inventory ‚Äì Product catalog with price, discount, rating, brand, and warranty.
  • Suppliers ‚Äì Manage suppliers with contact info and address.
  • Contacts ‚Äì Store company contact details and business status.
  • Analytics ‚Äì Predict sales for the year using interactive charts.
  • Payments ‚Äì Track paid and due amounts, transaction IDs, and methods.
  • Loyalty & Referral Programs ‚Äì Drive customer engagement and reward programs.
  • AI Support ‚Äì Integrated support system for handling customer inquiries.

Test Credentials

  • Email: admin@gmail.com
  • Password: admin123

Tech Stack

  • Next.js
  • React
  • Tailwind CSS
  • MongoDB & Mongoose
  • NextAuth
  • Recharts
  • Radix UI
  • UUID
  • Date-fns

Contributors

  • Khaled Saifulla ‚Äì Portfolio
  • Ansarul Islam ‚Äì Portfolio
  • Khairul Islam ‚Äì Portfolio
  • Najib Hossain ‚Äì Portfolio
  • Hm Faisal ‚Äì Portfolio

Local Setup

git clone https://github.com/your-username/sellsense.git
cd sellsense
npm install
cp .env.example .env.local
npm run dev
project.author: Khairul Islam

project.title: Task Management Application
project.details: Drag-and-drop task manager with Google Sign-in, real-time syncing via WebSockets, and MongoDB persistence.
project.longDetails:
A Task Management Application that allows users to manage their tasks across three categories: To-Do, In Progress, and Done. Tasks can be added, edited, deleted, and reordered via drag-and-drop.

  • Authentication: Firebase Authentication with Google Sign-in.
  • Real-time Updates: Tasks are updated instantly using WebSockets and saved in MongoDB.
  • Drag-and-Drop Interface: Built with react-beautiful-dnd for smooth interaction.
  • Persistent Storage: All task data is stored in MongoDB through an Express.js backend.
  • Dark Mode: Toggle available for better accessibility.
  • Task Due Dates: Visual indicators based on urgency.
  • Activity Log: Tracks task updates and movements across boards.

üèóÔ∏è Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React.js (Vite), Tailwind CSS, react-beautiful-dnd
  • Backend: Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB
  • Authentication: Firebase
  • Real-Time: Socket.IO

üì¶ Repositories

  • Client Repository
  • Server Repository
project.author: Khairul Islam

project.title: TaskEarn - Micro-tasking & Earning Platform
project.details: A secure and scalable platform connecting workers and buyers for completing micro-tasks and earning rewards.
project.longDetails:
TaskEarn is a micro-tasking and earning platform built with a multi-role system (Admin, Buyer, Worker). It allows buyers to post tasks, workers to complete them, and admins to manage the system efficiently.

  • Multi-Role System: Buyer, Worker, and Admin roles with separate dashboards and privileges.
  • Responsive UI: Fully responsive across all device sizes.
  • Authentication: Email/password login and Google Sign-in with Firebase.
  • Task Management: Buyers can post tasks with detailed instructions. Workers can apply and complete them for coins.
  • Stripe Payments: Buyers can purchase coins using Stripe.
  • Withdrawals: Workers can withdraw coins once a threshold is met.
  • Admin Controls: Manage users, tasks, reviews, and withdrawal requests.
  • Real-Time Notifications: Keeps users updated on status changes.
  • Pagination and Filtering: Efficient search and task discovery experience.
  • Security: Environment variables used to manage sensitive credentials.

üõ†Ô∏è Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS
  • Backend: Express.js, Node.js
  • Database: MongoDB with Mongoose
  • Authentication: Firebase
  • Payments: Stripe
  • Hosting: Firebase (Client), Vercel (Server)

üìÇ Repositories

  • Client Repository
  • Server Repository
project.author: Khairul Islam

project.title: Cleanify - House Cleaning Services
project.details: A user-friendly platform for managing, browsing, and booking house cleaning services.
project.longDetails:
Cleanify is a house cleaning services web application that allows users to:

  • Add, update, and delete their own services.
  • Browse cleaning services shared by others.
  • View detailed information about available services.
  • Book services and manage booking statuses in real time.

üõ†Ô∏è Features

  • Service Management: Full CRUD operations for user-submitted services.
  • Service Browsing: Explore services posted by others in the community.
  • Service Booking: Book services with real-time status updates.
  • Status Updates: Track the progress of your bookings easily.

üß± Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS
  • Backend: Node.js, Express.js
  • Database: MongoDB

üì¶ Dependencies

  • toast: for real-time user notifications
  • data-aos: scroll-based animations
  • date-fns: date formatting and manipulation
  • sweet2: user-friendly modal alerts

üìÇ Repositories

  • Client Repository
  • Server Repository

project.title: Pro Skills Battle - Competition Website
project.details: A responsive competition platform where users can register, track payments, and view leaderboards.
project.longDetails:
Pro Skills Battle is a modern competition platform built for a company to manage skill-based contests. It offers an intuitive user experience with real-time updates and sleek UI.

üöÄ Features

  • Responsive Design: Works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
  • User Registration: Participants can register directly through the website.
  • Payment Status: Users can check their registration payment updates.
  • Leaderboard: Displays a clean and dynamic leaderboard across all categories.
  • Committee Page: Showcases the list of committee members and contributors.

üîß Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, SweetAlert2
  • Backend: Google Sheets as a database via Google Apps Script (API)

üîó Repository

  • Private or internal use. No public repo provided.

project.title: Movie Portal
project.details: A user-friendly platform to browse, rate, and save your favorite movies with Google login support.
project.longDetails:
Movie Portal is an engaging movie browsing web app where users can discover films, manage their favorites, and contribute to the collection. With a clean design and user authentication, the platform ensures a smooth and secure user experience.

üöÄ Features

  • Dynamic Movie Exploration: Users can browse movies, view details, and rate them using an intuitive star rating system.
  • Private Routes: Pages like 'Add Movie' and 'My Favorites' are protected for authenticated users only.
  • Authentication: Google Sign-In and standard email registration for quick and secure access.
  • Favorites: Users can add and manage their favorite movies in a personal list.
  • Search & Filter: Quickly locate movies by title with a responsive search feature.

üåü Additional Features

  • Dark/Light Mode toggle
  • 404 Not Found page for invalid routes
  • Loading spinner during async operations
  • Robust form validation for movie entries

üß± Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React.js, React Router
  • Styling: Tailwind CSS
  • Authentication: Firebase (Google Login)
  • Other Libraries: React Simple Star Rating, React Toastify

üìÇ Pages Included

  • Home
  • All Movies
  • Add Movie
  • My Favorites
  • Movie Details
  • Login / Register

project.title: Gadget Heaven
project.details: An online gadget shop offering the latest electronics with features like wishlist, add-to-cart, filtering, and dynamic data display.
project.longDetails:
Gadget Heaven is an e-commerce web application that delivers a seamless tech shopping experience. It showcases a wide variety of electronic gadgets with features such as filtering by category, wishlist saving, and add-to-cart functionality. Built with core React concepts and optimized for responsive design.

üîë Key Features

  • Responsive Design: Fully optimized for all screen sizes.
  • Dynamic Data: Fetches and renders products from external APIs.
  • Filter by Category: Lets users quickly narrow down product selections.
  • Add to Cart: Users can build a shopping cart with desired gadgets.
  • Wishlist: Save favorite products for future purchases.
  • Checkout Flow: Purchase gadgets through a seamless interface.

‚öõÔ∏è React Fundamentals Used

  • Components: Modular, reusable UI pieces.
  • JSX: Writing UI using JavaScript syntax extensions.
  • Props & State: Dynamic and interactive UI rendering.
  • Hooks: useState and useEffect for state and side effects.
  • Local Storage: Persist user selections across sessions.

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

  • Frontend: React.js
  • Styling: CSS3 / Tailwind (if applicable)
  • State & Data Management: useState, useEffect, LocalStorage

üìÑ Additional Resources

  • Source Code
  • Requirement Document (optional)

project.title: Eco-Adventure
project.details: A sustainable tourism platform promoting eco-friendly travel experiences with expert consultation and interactive adventure details.
project.longDetails:
Eco-Adventure is a green travel-focused platform designed to promote sustainable tourism experiences such as mountain treks, ocean dives, and other environmentally responsible adventures. Users can register, manage profiles, explore adventures, and consult eco-tourism experts based on availability.

üöÄ Key Features

  • Authentication: Login, registration, and password reset functionality.
  • Profile Management: Update name, profile photo, and basic details.
  • Adventure Listings: View adventure descriptions with environmental impact highlights.
  • Consult with Experts: Book time-based consultations with eco-guides.
  • Responsive UI: Optimized layout with hover animations and interactive design.
  • Eco-Friendly Emphasis: Platform encourages responsible travel behavior and education.

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

  • Frontend: React.js
  • Styling: Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI
  • Animations: animate.css
  • Time Handling: moment.js
